text: @realDonaldTrump Better than bankrupting the United States!  🤑🤮Ohh...What charities have you donated to? I don’t see that being announced anymore?  Mmm? Like the wall? Where is it? Oh yeah it’s already there. Mexico didn’t pay obviously. Donate this years salary to Coronavirus research.  😷
